From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-21 11:33
Subject: Mid-Year Check-In, Bonus with MUSE, Marketplace for RESOLVE is now Live, Welcoming Deana Montalto, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1826&user=10620> 	

2 Weeks Left to Complete Your Mid-Year Check-In!

With just two weeks to go, now’s the perfect time to pause, reflect, and re-align. Review your 2025 goals, track your progress, and make any updates or adjustments while you still can.

Reminder: All goals will be locked on August 31st, and no further edits will be possible after this date.

Have a conversation with your manager and make sure you’re set up for a strong finish to the year.
Complete your Check-In here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1826&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Now in Session: 2K Bonus with MUSE

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1827&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Now in Session: 2K Bonus with MUSE

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1827&user=10620> 	

Back to school or back to business, the season calls for a stylish return to routine. From beauty that works overtime to statement bags that carry the week, consider this your cue to refresh it all (with a little something extra).

Shop AED 1,000 or more at select MUSE brands and unlock 2,000 Bonus Points on your next shop. Offer is valid in-store and online from 20 – 31 August.
Learn More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1827&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Marketplace for RESOLVE is now Live!

You can now access the dedicated RESOLVE section on the Group Marketplace, your go-to space for repurposed visual merchandising and décor items across the business.

From displays to furniture, RESOLVE gives unused items a second life through a first-come, first-served model. No returns or exchanges, and all items are delivered directly to you.

It’s a simple step toward a more circular, sustainable future.
Ready to shop? Access now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1828&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1828&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Deana Montalto

It’s a simple step toward a more circular, sustainable future.
Ready to shop? Access now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1828&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1828&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Deana Montalto

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1829&user=10620> 	

Deana joins our Group as Director of Merchandise Planning, reporting to Mandi Kaur, VP Planning. She is a seasoned retail leader with extensive international experience across the GCC, Asia Pacific–Latin America, Europe, and Australia.

With deep expertise in strategic planning, inventory management, and digital transformation. 
Deana is passionate about people, performance, and unlocking potential through collaboration and innovation.
Read more. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1829&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1830&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!

You can also refer your network directly through our Internal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1831&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
